thread.section_title: New Mexico High School Sports Headlines
thread.title: Hendo's Week 9 Picks

title: Hendo's Week 9 Picks
text: Hendo's Pick Del Norte @ Capital Taking the upset pick here. Think the Knights keep their playoff hopes alive in a thriller. Clovis @ Hobbs The Eagles win back the Little Rebel - Expecting a ton of points and a ton of fans Friday at Watson St. Pius X @ Moriarty Thought about taking the upset here, but St. Pius X is better than people are given them credit for. La Cueva vs. Sandia Taking Big Red to move to 2-1 in district St. Mike's @ Hope Christian Horsemen are able to out-run Huskies in a 4 hour type game Belen @ Los Lunas Flipped a coin here and it landed on it's side... Rio Rancho @ Cibola The red hot Rams keep rollin, pick up a 2 touchdown win over the Coogs tonight Alamogordo @ Carlsbad Carlsbad keeps it close for a while, Tigers able to muscle two touchdown victory Hatch Valley @ Cobre Bears take down Indians in key district game, move to 9-0 Cleveland @ Volcano Vista I think this game is going to be close, Hawks are no joke. No. 1 stays No. 1 though... Gallup vs. Miyamura Could be closer than expected, still rollin with the Patriots Albuquerque @ Valley Vikings win a late season district game, last second touchdown needed Artesia @ Roswell
